item.title: How to create a Linux VM in Azure?
item.description: Create a new account in Microsoft Azure. For new users, Azure gives free credits for 30 days and many services free of cost upto a limit for 12 months. For students, Microsoft also give away many resources and azure credits. You just have to reach to them by their email. Login to your azure account. Step 1 Search for Ubuntu 16.04 LTS In the search bar, search Ubuntu 16.04 LTS and select create.

item.title: Deploy Angular application on Azure Web Service
item.description: Deploying an Angular application on the Azure Web Service can be a pain if you don’t know from where to start. This tutorial will consist of the following steps: Create an Azure Web Service Build the Angular application Configure the Web Service and deploy it Let’s start with creating the Azure Web Service; If you don’t have any account, you can sign up for free account and $200 dollars will be credit in your azure account to play with.
